TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WorkflowDebuggerSteppingOption extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 指定工作流程偵錯工具如何逐步執行複合活動的同步執行子活動。

span.span: Specifies how the workflow debugger will step through concurrently executing child activities of a composite activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 此列舉配合 屬性使用以定義下列兩種行為：This enumeration is used with the attribute to define the following two behaviors: - **同時逐步執行**。**Concurrent stepping**. 這個逐步模式可讓您逐步執行和偵錯工作流程中的並行執行活動。This mode of stepping enables you to step through and debug concurrently executing activities in the workflow. 使用此選項時，您會在工作流程內的並行執行活動執行時發現控制權的改變。With this option, you will notice that a change in control occurs when concurrently executing activities run within the workflow. - **循序逐步執行**。**Sequential stepping**. 這個逐步模式可讓您逐步執行和偵錯複合活動的特定分支，例如 或 活動。This mode of stepping enables you to step through and debug a particular branch of a composite activity, such as the or the activity. 使用此選項偵錯時，由於工作流程中同時執行其他活動，因此您將不會注意到控制項中發生變化。When you use this option to debug, you will not notice that a change in control occurs due to concurrent execution of other activities in the workflow. 當工作流程中的其他活動可能正在同時執行時，偵錯工具只會逐步執行目前選取之分支中的活動。The debugger only steps through the activities in the currently selected branch while other activities in the workflow may be executing concurrently. 例如，根據預設， 活動中最左邊的分支和 活動的第一個子活動用於逐步執行。For example, by default, the leftmost branch in a activity and the first child activity of a activity are used for stepping. 如果您想要偵錯任何其他分支或子活動，必須在該分支或子活動上放置明確的中斷點。If you are interested in debugging any other branch or child activity, an explicit breakpoint must be placed on that branch or child activity. 觸發 (Trigger) 中斷點時，逐步執行會在該分支中繼續。Stepping continues in that branch when the breakpoint is triggered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.WorkflowDebuggerSteppingOption Concurrent = int32(1)

span.span: The child activities will be debugged concurrently.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.WorkflowDebuggerSteppingOption Sequential = int32(0)

span.span: The child activities will be debugged sequentially.
